2925675.Description: The course is intended for developers and IT specialists. It provides theoretical and practical knowledge of TON blockchain technologies and concepts, including FunC programming language, smart contracts and their testing, and creating mini-applications.

chapters.2: 2. TVM, Transactions, Scalability, and Business Cases

chapters.9: 9. Ecosystem Products, Future Plans, and Vision

2926478.Description: Learn essential skills in product management, from market research and product strategy to development and launch. This course covers key concepts, tools, and best practices to manage product life cycles, drive innovation, and meet customer needs.
